Fine Outlook Video Digitization

Transfer and digitization services for a variety of still and video formats.

Digitize your footage
Today!

You mail us your footage

We clean and scan your media into the highest quality digital files

We deliver the files digitally and physically with your returned footage

Mail us any brand of tapes, photos, film reels and audio. Every item will then be digitized with our state-of-the-art equipment located right here in the USA.

We can digitize consumer videotapes like VHS, Hi8, VHS-C, MiniDV, 8mm Video Cassette, Digital8, and even film like Super8, 8mm, and even 16mm. We also do audio transfer from 8mm, mini-cassetes, reel-to-reel, and LPs.

CC

Digitization at the physical limit

We digitize your footage at a level of quality that is at or beyond the physical medium's information storage.

For optical films like Super8, we use a large image sensor from the professional film industry which minimizes noise, has a high color sensitivity, and captures at a high resolution. We focus on the image with state of the art German optics, and light the film with cool LEDs. For magnetic tape films like Hi8, we use well maintained players that send the analogue signal to a studio quality capture card. Digital magnetic media like MiniDV and D8 are captured with the lossless firewire data transfer protocol. All our transfer methods capture all the information present in the analogue medium.
